post.content:
Some notes about The Stadium Foundation Car Raffle (Please share with your band member)

The deadline to turn in money, ticket stubs, and unsold tickets is Friday, September 11. Students who sell their tickets by this deadline have a chance to win $200.00 in a drawing at the Homecoming Game on Sept. 25th.

We are working with other NRHS groups to raise money for the Stadium Foundation, but we get to keep $10.00 of every ticket WE sell. Our goal is for 100% participation from each band member. To help you with your sales we've provided two resources that are easy to access:

  1. Attached is a letter that each student can personalize by filling in the missing information and emailing to friends and family. (You know all those Aunts & Uncles & Grandparents who comment on how great you bandos are? Give them a chance to show their support by buying a raffle ticket.) We have included a teaser about the upcoming fruit sale, too. In case people don't want raffle tickets, maybe they will buy some fruit for the next fundraiser.
  2. We have also posted two photos on the Band Booster Facebook Page that everyone can share to their own wall. Write a customized note to go with it and let people know how to contact you for tickets. It's easy to find customers if you just get the word out.

    3. It is very important that you return your money and tickets by September 11th. We really want each band member to sell their two tickets. However, if you have no intention of selling your tickets, please return them to the band box ASAP. Another student might want them for their sales. Each ticket, sold or unsold, must be accounted for.

    Remember, you could win $200.00 just for selling your tickets by September 11th AND ... if you sell both tickets you could win a free contest hoodie from Band Boosters, too!

    Kids, Thank You for doing your part. Parents, Thank YOU for your help! Good Luck!

    Jane Coleman ~ Car Raffle Chair mattnjane.coleman@att.net 440-759-9864
